name: Flip Flop Gene
description:
A game about life and family (insert Vin Diesel voice here). Travel through generations of a small community and take part in their doom or success.

This game was developed for the Global Game Jam 2023 (original submission link here).

Contributers:

  • Ricardo Rodrigues
  • Pedro Moço
  • Tomás Nascimento
  • Joana Gonçalves
  • João Batista
